topic.title: AttributeError: 'Config' object has no attribute 'log_dir'
topic.body: ### Step 1: Please describe your environment * ZeroNet version: __Rev3864___ * Operating system: __Mac OS 10.14.4___ * Web browser: __Safari & Chrome___ * Tor status: not available * Opened port: yes * Special configuration: ____ ### Step 2: Describe the problem: I can't start ZeroNet on my computer. When I run zeronet.py, there will be an error and I didn't find a solution to fix it. and in fact [cd82215](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/commit/cd822156c9fda420afeb63eda4d9637441f7393f) is not suitable for my situation. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. __download ZeroNet-mater from github___ 2. __open the .zip and enter the directory___ 3. __"python2 ./zeronet.py"___ #### Observed Results:

1604067271_mirrored_neighborBoy0_github.body: yes, I have already install these libs, but it doesn't work.
and I'm trying to make a P2P website. Could you please tell me how can I call python files in zeronet? Thank you for your help.
